paper_abstract: News Finder automates the steps involved in finding, selecting, categorizing, and publishing news stories that meet relevance criteria for the artificial intelligence community. The software combines a broad search of online news sources with topic-specific trained models and heuristics. Since August 2010, the program has been used to operate the AI in the News service that is part of the AAAI AITopics website.
paper_title: NewsFinder: Automating an AI News Service
